amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide for the establishment of retirement savings accounts; provide credits to low and middle income workers who participate in an employer-sponsored pension account or an IRA; and make small business employees eligible for credits on their retirement plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-760 to include the text of H.R. 4843, as reported, H. Rept. 106-753, to provide a credit for low and middle income workers, make small business employees eligible to claim a credit, provide relief from certain section 405 rules, and express a sense of Congress concerning the resolution of cash balances.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Neal.
Neal amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. The modification strikes SEC. 804, Limitation on Catch-Up Contributions.
On agreeing to the Neal amendment (A002) as modified Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 200 - 221 (Roll no. 410).
